Nighlight::

the volunteers left quickly the plante... perhasp we must ask help to 
Tylrael and I'm afrais that also to Hydrass..."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
>

something in the future might destroy our work before the council 
picks it up. Our best bet is to take a little time travel trip to 
earth, locate the council and get the matrix.
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Yggdrasil: Of course, that used to be true, but the Survivor 
Council

that 
> of the Humans. I'll try to work on that.

>

get

all

> anyone on earth is capable of hearing us. The only cybertronian

> >

> opposed to this course of action and had let Optimus know it. 
Rodimus

> However after the government change and the great upgrade Rodimus
